item.title: 解释者：伊朗与最大买家中国扩大石油贸易
item.description:
China's oil imports from Iran have hit record highs as Iran ramps up output despite the threat of further U.S. sanctions.翻译:随着伊朗不顾美国进一步制裁的威胁而增加产量，中国从伊朗的石油进口量创下历史新高。

Existing sanctions were implemented over Iran's nuclear programme, and U.S. lawmakers are seeking to exert further pressure after the Oct. 7 attacks on Israel by Hamas, which has long been backed by Iran, although Tehran has denied any involvement.翻译:现有的制裁是针对伊朗核计划实施的，在哈马斯 10 月 7 日对以色列发动袭击后，美国立法者正在寻求施加进一步的压力。哈马斯长期以来一直得到伊朗的支持，尽管德黑兰否认有任何参与。

U.S. lawmakers are now considering legislation that could impose measures on foreign ports and refineries that process petroleum exported from Iran.翻译:美国立法者目前正在考虑立法，对加工伊朗出口石油的外国港口和炼油厂采取措施。

Here are key facts on Iran's oil trade with China:

HOW MUCH IRANIAN OIL IS CHINA BUYING?

China, the world's largest crude importer and Iran's top customer, bought an average 1.05 million barrels per day (bpd) of Iranian oil in the first 10 months of 2023, according to shiptracking data from Vortexa. This is 60% above pre-sanction peaks recorded by Chinese customs in 2017.翻译:根据 Vortexa 的船舶追踪数据，中国是全球最大的原油进口国和伊朗的最大客户，2023 年前 10 个月平均每天购买 105 万桶伊朗石油。这比中国海关 2017 年制裁前记录的峰值高出 60%。

Imports jumped this year after Tehran raised output and offered steep discounts.翻译:在德黑兰提高产量并提供大幅折扣后，今年进口量猛增。

Tehran's October output edged up to 3.17 million bpd, a Reuters survey found, the highest since 2018, when Washington re-imposed sanctions on Iran, according to Reuters surveys and OPEC figures.翻译:路透调查发现，德黑兰 10 月份产量微升至 317 万桶/日，根据路透调查和 OPEC 数据，这是自 2018 年华盛顿重新对伊朗实施制裁以来的最高水平。

China's October imports from Iran are estimated to have reached around 1.45 million bpd, the highest monthly level ever, Vortexa data showed.

HOW DOES IRANIAN OIL ENTER CHINA?

Except for two cargoes in December 2021 and January 2022, China's customs has not recorded any direct imports from Iran since December 2020.翻译:除2021年12月和2022年1月的两批货物外，2020年12月以来中国海关未再有从伊朗直接进口的记录。

Almost all Iranian oil entering China is branded as originating from Malaysia or other Middle Eastern countries.翻译:几乎所有进入中国的伊朗石油都被贴上来自马来西亚或其他中东国家的标签。

The oil is carried by a "dark fleet" of older tankers that typically switch off their transponders when loading at Iranian ports to avoid detection.翻译:这些石油由老式油轮组成的“黑暗舰队”运输，这些油轮在伊朗港口装货时通常会关闭应答器以避免被发现。

Other tactics used by such ships include faking locations and conducting ship-to-ship (STS) operations at locations outside of authorised transfer zones and sometimes in poor weather to conceal activities, raising fears among nations over potential pollution.翻译:此类船只使用的其他策略包括伪造地点和在授权转运区之外的地点进行船对船（STS）操作，有时甚至在恶劣天气下进行活动，以隐藏活动， 引起各国对潜在污染的担忧。

These ships sometimes become traceable via satellites near ports in Oman, the UAE and most prominently Malaysia, a top trans-shipment hub, before discharging cargoes mostly at ports in China's Shandong province, according to Vortexa and Kpler.翻译:Vortexa 和 Kpler 表示，这些船只在主要在中国山东省的港口卸货之前，有时可以通过阿曼、阿联酋和最重要的转运中心马来西亚附近港口的卫星进行追踪。

China regulates crude oil imports by issuing quotas. Earlier this year when quotas were tight, traders labelled a few Iranian heavy crude shipments as bitumen mix, prompting Chinese authorities to step up tanker inspections.

WHICH CHINESE REFINERIES BUY IRANIAN CRUDE?

Giant state refiners Sinopec and PetroChina were once key Iranian oil clients, with investments in oilfields in the country. But they have stopped lifting Iranian oil since late 2019, after then-U.S. President Donald Trump re-imposed sanctions on Tehran's petroleum exports.翻译:大型国有炼油企业中石化和中石油曾经是伊朗的主要石油客户，在该国的油田进行了投资。但在时任美国总统唐纳德·特朗普重新对德黑兰石油出口实施制裁后，自 2019 年底以来，他们已停止开采伊朗石油。

The sanctions initially led to a sharp drop in flows to China, but volumes have rebounded as more independent refiners joined the purchases.翻译:制裁最初导致流入中国的石油量急剧下降，但随着更多独立炼油厂加入采购，数量有所回升。

Most of the more than 40 independent Chinese refiners, known as teapots, process Iranian oil, according to Chinese traders. Teapots have little exposure to the dollar-based global financial system and don't need to cooperate with western firms on technology. Most of the transactions are believed to be paid in Chinese currency.

WHY DO INDEPENDENT REFINERIES FAVOUR IRANIAN OIL?

Mainly because the oil is cheap and of good quality.翻译:主要是因为石油价格便宜，质量好。

Iranian Light, the main export grade, trades at a discount of about $13 a barrel to ICE Brent on a deliver-ex-ship basis in Shandong for December arrival. That compares with a premium of about $5 a barrel for similar-quality Oman crude.

WHAT'S BEIJING'S STANCE ON THE TRADE?

China also buys crude from Russia and Venezuela - which have also faced U.S. sanctions. Beijing has long opposed unilateral sanctions and has said its normal trade deserves respect and protection.翻译:中国还从俄罗斯和委内瑞拉购买原油——这两个国家也面临美国的制裁。北京长期以来一直反对单边制裁，并表示其正常贸易值得尊重和保护。

However, China's last Iranian oil cargo officially recorded by customs was in early 2022, destined for state reserves.

WHAT ENFORCEMENT ACTION HAS THE U.S. GOVERNMENT TAKEN?

Since 2021, Washington has sanctioned over 180 individuals and entities related to Iran's petroleum and petrochemical sectors or related to moving and laundering illicit proceeds.翻译:自 2021 年以来，华盛顿已制裁了 180 多名与伊朗石油和石化行业有关或与转移和洗钱非法收益有关的个人和实体。

Over 40 vessels have been identified as blocked property of the sanctioned entities.翻译:超过 40 艘船只已被确定为受制裁实体的封锁财产。

The U.S. government also regularly engages with other countries to strongly discourage them from taking steps that contravene sanctions on Iran, the State Department told Reuters in October.翻译:美国国务院十月份告诉路透社，美国政府还定期与其他国家接触，强烈劝阻它们采取违反对伊朗制裁的措施。

Reporting by Muyu Xu; Editing by Florence Tan, Tony Munroe and Kim Coghill翻译:徐木宇报道；编辑：Florence Tan、Tony Munroe 和 Kim Coghill

item.title: 独家：中国主权基金任命新北美首席消息人士
item.description:
China Investment Corp (CIC) has hired a new North America head for its New York office, two people familiar with the matter said, filling a months-long vacancy and showing the sovereign wealth fund wants to maintain the outpost despite flaring U.S.-Sino tensions.翻译:两位知情人士表示，中国投资公司（CIC）为其纽约办事处聘请了一位新的北美主管，填补了长达数月的空缺，这表明尽管中美关系紧张，这家主权财富基金仍希望维持这一前哨基地。 。

New York is the $1.35 trillion fund's only office outside mainland China besides Hong Kong. It was set up in 2015 to help it manage its U.S. assets. Since then, Washington has cracked down on many Chinese investments it deems a national security risk.翻译:纽约是该基金规模1.35万亿美元的除香港以外在中国大陆以外的唯一办事处。它成立于 2015 年，旨在帮助其管理其美国资产。此后，华盛顿对许多它认为构成国家安全风险的中国投资进行了打击。

CIC asked Bai Xiaoqing, who was in charge of some of its private equity investments from Beijing, to move to New York for the North America head role, the sources said, requesting anonymity because the move has not been publicly announced.翻译:消息人士称，中投公司要求在北京负责部分私募股权投资的白晓庆调往纽约担任北美业务负责人。由于此举尚未公开宣布，消息人士要求匿名。

She succeeds Zhang Hong, who left CIC at the end of last year and moved back to China following six years in the role, one of the sources added. The reason behind Zhang's departure could not be learned.翻译:其中一位消息人士补充说，她接替了张宏，张宏于去年底离开中投公司，并在担任该职位六年后回到中国。张离开的原因尚不清楚。

CIC, Bai and Zhang did not respond to requests for comment.翻译:中投公司、白和张没有回应置评请求。

The Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States, which reviews deals for national security concerns, has been blocking Chinese investments it believes may erode U.S. technological edge or jeopardize data security. U.S. authorities have been especially suspicious of investments originating from entities close to China's communist government, like CIC.翻译:出于国家安全考虑而审查交易的美国外国投资委员会一直在阻止中国的投资，它认为这些投资可能会侵蚀美国的技术优势或危及数据安全。美国当局对来自与中国共产党政府关系密切的实体（例如中投公司）的投资尤其持怀疑态度。

As a result, Chinese investments have dropped from a peak of 63 deals totaling $53.5 billion in 2016 to just three deals collectively worth only $400 million this year, according to the American Enterprise Institute, which collates data on investments of more than $95 million.翻译:美国企业研究所 (American Enterprise Institute) 整理了超过 9500 万美元的投资数据，结果显示，中国投资已从 2016 年 63 笔总价值 535 亿美元的交易高峰期下降到今年的 3 笔总价值仅为 4 亿美元的交易。

Still, CIC's most recent disclosures show some of its U.S. holdings remain sizeable. U.S. stocks made up 61.48% of the overseas public market equities it held in 2021, according to its latest annual report. Public equities accounted for 35.4% of its total portfolio.翻译:尽管如此，中投公司最近披露的信息显示，其在美国的部分持股规模仍然相当大。根据其最新年报，2021年其持有的海外公开市场股票中，美股占比为61.48%。公共股票占其投资组合总额的35.4%。

CIC is also a significant investor in U.S. private equity funds, as so-called alternative assets comprise almost half of its portfolio. One of its most prominent investments has been a $2.5 billion Goldman Sachs Group Inc (GS.N) private equity fund aimed at investing in companies that can benefit from closer U.S.-China ties.翻译:中投公司也是美国私募股权基金的重要投资者，因为所谓的另类资产几乎占其投资组合的一半。其最著名的投资之一是高盛集团(GS.N) 25 亿美元的私募股权基金，旨在投资能够从更紧密的中美关系中受益的公司。

Launched in 2017 and dubbed the China-U.S. Industrial Cooperation Fund, it has invested in several companies in the United States and Britain.翻译:该基金成立于2017年，名为中美产业合作基金，已投资美国和英国的多家公司。

CIC has also cultivated ties with BlackRock Inc (BLK.N), the world's largest asset manager. It said last month that CIC Chairman Peng Chun met BlackRock Chief Executive Larry Fink to discuss "cooperation on multiple fronts". It did not provide further details, and a BlackRock spokesperson did not respond to questions about the meeting.翻译:中投公司还与全球最大的资产管理公司贝莱德公司（BLK.N）建立了联系。上个月，中投公司董事长彭纯会见了贝莱德首席执行官拉里·芬克，讨论“多方面合作”。它没有提供更多细节，贝莱德发言人也没有回答有关会议的问题。

Bai joined CIC in 2007. She previously worked for China's Ministry of Finance for over 12 years and served as deputy director, according to the Milken Institute's website.翻译:据米尔肯研究所网站称，白女士于2007年加入中投公司。此前，她在中国财政部工作了12年多，并担任副主任。

Another reminder that China continues to be a major investor in U.S. assets came on Thursday, when a ransomware attack on Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (601398.SS) disrupted trading in the U.S. Treasury market.翻译:周四，中国工商银行（601398.SS）遭受勒索软件攻击，扰乱了美国国债市场的交易，再次提醒人们，中国仍然是美国资产的主要投资者。

Reporting by Echo Wang in New York and Roxanne Liu in Beijing; Additional reporting by Kane Wu in Hong Kong; Editing by Greg Roumeliotis and Edwina Gibbs翻译:纽约 Echo Wang 和北京 Roxanne Liu 报道；吴凯恩 (Kane Wu) 在香港的补充报道；格雷格·鲁梅利奥蒂斯和埃德温娜·吉布斯编辑

item.title: 行业高管称，亚洲航空公司正准备应对成本打击和中国旅客回归缓慢
item.description:
Asia-Pacific airlines face headwinds from rising fuel prices and high inflation, industry executives said on Friday, adding to a downbeat outlook for a segment where travel demand is struggling to recover fully to pre-pandemic levels.翻译:行业高管周五表示，亚太地区的航空公司面临燃油价格上涨和高通胀的不利影响，这加剧了该行业的悲观前景，因为该行业的旅行需求正在努力完全恢复到大流行前的水平。

The region's air travel recovered to just 69% of 2019 levels for the year through September, trailing all other regions, impacted mainly by China's slow reopening of borders after COVID-19, according to the International Air Transport Association.翻译:据国际航空运输协会称，截至 9 月份，该地区的航空旅行仅恢复至 2019 年水平的 69%，落后于所有其他地区，这主要受到中国在 COVID-19 后缓慢重新开放边境的影响。

"Industry recovery has been slowed by inflation, the tight job market, supply chain constraints and fuel prices, which are still higher than in 2019," Subhas Menon, Director General of the Association of Asia Pacific Airlines, told its annual gathering.翻译:亚太航空协会总干事苏巴斯·梅农 (Subhas Menon) 在其年度聚会上表示：“由于通胀、就业市场紧张、供应链限制以及燃油价格仍高于 2019 年，行业复苏速度放缓。”

"Non-oil costs are also escalating in areas like ground handling and taxation, thus squeezing the profit margins for airlines," he said, adding supply chain issues continue to impact deliveries of new aircraft and spare parts for maintenance.翻译:他表示：“地勤和税收等领域的非石油成本也在不断上升，从而挤压了航空公司的利润率。”他补充说，供应链问题继续影响新飞机和维护备件的交付。

Singapore Airlines (SIA) (SIAL.SI) posted on Tuesday a record profit for the six months ended September, but profit in the second quarter slipped 3.7% from the previous quarter, underscoring the growing cost pressure.翻译:新加坡航空 (SIA) (SIAL.SI)周二公布截至 9 月份的六个月利润创历史新高，但第二季度利润较上一季度下滑 3.7%，凸显了日益增长的成本压力。

"As people added capacities in the recent half year, in terms of yield it has actually come down," said SIA CEO Goh Choon Phong, in response to a question on whether air fares have peaked.翻译:新航首席执行官 Goh Choon Phong 在回答有关机票价格是否已见顶的问题时表示：“随着近半年运力的增加，收益率实际上有所下降。”

The industry is banking on Chinese travellers returning in full force to kick off a fresh wave of growth, which Menon expects by the first half of next year.翻译:该行业寄希望于中国游客的全面回归，掀起新一波的增长浪潮，梅农预计，这一情况将在明年上半年实现。

China was the largest air travel market before COVID, accounting for a fifth of international travel within Asia Pacific and 6% globally.翻译:在新冠疫情爆发之前，中国是最大的航空旅行市场，占亚太地区国际旅行的五分之一，占全球的 6%。

But that has fallen to 10% and 2%, respectively, this year, as recovery in China has been mainly focused on domestic travel and the slow lifting of restrictions on group tours to popular overseas destinations limited international travel.翻译:但今年这一数字已分别降至 10% 和 2%，因为中国的复苏主要集中在国内旅游，而对热门海外目的地的团体旅游限制的缓慢取消限制了国际旅游。

"We will start to see a downhill, but more of a soft landing instead of falling off a cliff," said independent aviation analyst Brendan Sobie.翻译:独立航空分析师布伦丹·索比表示：“我们将开始看到下坡，但更多的是软着陆，而不是从悬崖上掉下来。”

"The economic situation is cloudy, not dire, ...but there's still a lot of supply constraints."翻译:“经济形势阴云密布，但并不严峻……但供应仍然存在很多限制。”

Reporting by Chen Lin; Writing by Miyoung Kim; Editing by Muralikumar Anantharaman翻译:陈琳报道；作者：Miyoung Kim；穆拉利库马尔·阿南塔拉曼编辑

item.title: 香港第三季度GDP同比增长4.1%，增长预测下调
item.description:
Hong Kong's economy expanded 4.1% in the third quarter from a year earlier, the government said on Friday, adding that inbound tourism and private consumption would underpin growth for the rest of the year.翻译:香港政府周五表示，第三季度香港经济同比增长4.1%，并补充说，入境旅游业和私人消费将支撑今年剩余时间的增长。

On a seasonally adjusted quarterly basis, the economy grew 0.1% in the July-September period. That compared with a 1.3% slide in the April-June quarter.翻译:按季度调整后，7-9月经济增长0.1%。相比之下，4 月至 6 月季度下滑 1.3%。

The government revised down the full-year economic growth forecast to 3.2% from an earlier estimate of a 4.0% to 5.0% range.翻译:政府将全年经济增长预期从之前的4.0%至5.0%下调至3.2%。

Reporting by Twinnie Siu and Donny Kwok; Editing by Edmund Klamann翻译:Twinnie Siu 和 Donny Kwok 报道；编辑：埃德蒙·克拉曼

item.title: 菲律宾谴责中国“无端胁迫行为”阻止补给任务
item.description:
The Philippines on Friday condemned China's coast guard for "unprovoked acts of coercion and dangerous manoeuvres," including its use of a water cannon against one of its boats in an attempt to disrupt a resupply mission in the South China Sea.翻译:菲律宾周五谴责中国海警“无端胁迫和危险举动”，包括对一艘船只使用高压水枪，试图扰乱在南海的补给任务。

China's actions, the Philippines said, have not only "put the lives of our people at risk," but have "put into question and significant doubt the sincerity of its calls for peaceful dialogue".翻译:菲律宾表示，中国的行为不仅“将我国人民的生命置于危险之中”，而且“让人对其呼吁和平对话的诚意产生质疑和严重怀疑”。

The regular resupply missions support the Philippines' troops stationed in an intentionally grounded dilapidated warship on Second Thomas Shoal, a hotly disputed atoll in the South China Sea that Manila calls Ayungin and is known as Renai Reef in China.翻译:这些定期补给任务为驻扎在仁爱礁的一艘故意搁浅的破旧军舰上的菲律宾军队提供支持。仁爱礁是南海有争议的一个环礁，马尼拉称之为阿云金岛，在中国被称为仁爱礁。

China claims almost the entire South China Sea, which includes the Second Thomas Shoal, and has deployed hundreds of vessels to patrol there, including what Manila refers to as "Chinese maritime militia", which it said were involved in the latest attempt to obstruct the resupply mission.翻译:中国声称对包括仁爱礁在内的几乎整个南海拥有主权，并部署了数百艘船只在那里巡逻，其中包括马尼拉所说的“中国海上民兵”，中国称这些船只参与了最近一次试图阻挠南中国海的活动。补给任务。

China's foreign ministry opposes actions that undermine China's sovereignty and interests and has lodged solemn representations with the Philippine embassy, its spokesperson Wang Wenbin said on Friday at a regular press conference.翻译:中国外交部发言人汪文斌周五在例行记者会上表示，中国外交部反对损害中国主权和利益的行为，已向菲律宾驻华使馆提出严正交涉。

China's coast guard said two small Philippine transport ships and three coast guard ships entered the waters without the permission of the Chinese government and urged the Philippines to stop infringing on Beijing's sovereignty.翻译:中国海警表示，两艘菲律宾小型运输船和三艘海警船未经中国政府许可进入该海域，并敦促菲律宾停止侵犯北京主权。

It said in a statement its actions were lawful and it has and made temporary special arrangements for the Philippine side to transport food and other necessary daily necessities.翻译:中方在声明中表示，中方行动合法，已为菲方运输食品等必要生活物资作出临时特别安排。

The Philippines' government said the resupply mission was completed, even as its boats were "subjected to extremely reckless and dangerous harassment at close proximity" by the Chinese coast guard's inflatable boats inside the shoal.翻译:菲律宾政府表示，补给任务已经完成，尽管其船只在浅滩内“受到了中国海警充气艇极其鲁莽和危险的近距离骚扰”。

For years, Manila and Beijing have been embroiled in on-off confrontations at the Second Thomas Shoal as China has become more assertive in pressing its maritime claims, alarming rival claimants and other states operating in the South China Sea, including the United States and Japan.翻译:多年来，马尼拉和北京在仁爱礁陷入断断续续的对抗，因为中国在提出海洋主张方面变得更加自信，这令其他声索国和包括美国和日本在内的在南海活动的其他国家感到震惊。 。

Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida said during his visit to Manila on Saturday that his country, the Philippines and the United States were cooperating to protect the freedom of the South China Sea.翻译:日本首相岸田文雄周六访问马尼拉时表示，日本、菲律宾和美国正在合作保护南海的自由。

On Thursday, the Philippines said it was acquiring five 97-metre (318.24-ft) multi-role response vessels to strengthen the capabilities of its coast guard and the 29.3 billion pesos ($523.96 million) project would be funded by Official Development Assistance loans from Japan.翻译:周四，菲律宾表示将采购五艘 97 米（318.24 英尺）多用途响应船，以加强其海岸警卫队的能力，该耗资 293 亿比索（5.2396 亿美元）的项目将由来自菲律宾的官方发展援助贷款资助。日本。

Both Japan and Washington have their support behind a 2016 ruling by the Permanent Court of Arbitration in the Hague, that said Beijing's expansive claims had no legal basis, delivering a historic legal victory for the Philippines. Under the ruling, the shoal is inside the Philippines' exclusive economic zone.翻译:日本和华盛顿都支持海牙常设仲裁法院 2016 年的一项裁决，该裁决称北京的广泛主张没有法律依据，为菲律宾带来了历史性的法律胜利。根据裁决，该浅滩位于菲律宾专属经济区内。

China's use of water cannons followed a series of incidents in the South China Sea, including the collisions between China's vessels and two Manila ships on Oct. 22. The Philippines accused China coastguard of "intentionally" colliding with its vessels.翻译:中国在南海发生一系列事件后使用了高压水枪，其中包括10月22日中国船只与马尼拉两艘船只相撞。菲律宾指责中国海警“故意”与其船只相撞。

item.title: 中方表示与越南就双边关系进行了坦诚友好的会谈
item.description:
China said its vice foreign minister held frank and friendly talks with his Vietnamese counterpart in Hanoi on Thursday that encompassed bilateral ties, land borders and maritime issues.翻译:中国表示，中国外交部副部长周四在河内与越南副外长举行了坦诚友好的会谈，会谈内容涵盖双边关系、陆地边界和海上问题。

The meeting between Vice Foreign Minister Sun Weidong and Vietnam's Deputy Foreign Minister Nguyen Minh Duong had not previously been disclosed by Beijing.翻译:北京此前并未披露外交部副部长孙卫东与越南外交部副部长阮明阳的会晤。

They agreed that bilateral relations have maintained good momentum under both countries' current leadership, Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson Wang Wenbin said on Friday in response to reporters' questions.翻译:中国外交部发言人汪文斌周五在回答记者提问时表示，双方一致认为，在两国现任领导下，双边关系保持良好发展势头。

The two sides value the progress made in the opening and upgrading of border crossings and infrastructure connectivity, Wang told a regular news conference.翻译:王毅在例行记者会上表示，双方高度评价两国边境口岸开放升级、基础设施互联互通取得的进展。

He added that they had agreed to try to make the Sino-Vietnamese land border a border of "permanent peace" and "intergenerational friendship and prosperous development".翻译:他补充说，他们同意努力使中越陆地边界成为“永久和平”和“代际友谊和繁荣发展”的边界。

The two sides fully affirmed joint efforts made to maintain the stability of their maritime situation in recent years, reaffirmed the need to continue to strengthen dialogue and consultation, as well as to properly manage their differences, he said.翻译:双方充分肯定近年来两国为维护海上局势稳定所做的共同努力，重申需要继续加强对话协商，妥善管控分歧。

When asked if President Xi Jinping would visit Hanoi, Wang said he had no information that he could provide.翻译:当被问及习近平主席是否将访问河内时，王毅表示，他无法提供任何信息。

China and the United States have been jostling for influence among Southeast Asian nations including Vietnam, which in September elevated its ties with Washington to a comprehensive strategic partnership, putting its one-time enemy on par with Beijing and Moscow.翻译:中国和美国一直在争夺在包括越南在内的东南亚国家中的影响力，越南于9月将与华盛顿的关系提升为全面战略伙伴关系，将其曾经的敌人与北京和莫斯科平起平坐。

Reuters last month reported that Vietnamese and Chinese officials were preparing for a possible trip by Xi to Hanoi. At the time, plans were for the trip to take place at the end of October or in early November.翻译:路透社上个月报道称，越南和中国官员正在为习近平可能访问河内做准备。当时计划在十月底或十一月初进行这次旅行。

Three Hanoi-based diplomats subsequently said the visit was likely to be postponed to December.翻译:三名驻河内外交官随后表示，此次访问可能会推迟到 12 月。

Reporting by Joe Cash; writing by Ryan Woo and Albee Zhang; Editing by Edwina Gibbs翻译:乔·卡什报道；作者：Ryan Woo 和 Albee 张；编辑：埃德温娜·吉布斯

item.title: 中国表示将确保中缅边境安全稳定
item.description:
China will ensure security and stability at its border with Myanmar, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Friday, while urging all parties in Myanmar to immediately stop fighting.翻译:中国外交部周五表示，中方将确保中缅边境安全稳定，同时敦促缅甸各方立即停止战斗。

The president of military-ruled Myanmar has said the country is at risk of breaking apart due to ineffective management of recent violence in its border regions with China.翻译:军政府统治的缅甸总统表示，由于对最近与中国边境地区发生的暴力事件管理不力，该国面临分裂的风险。

The Myanmar junta is facing the biggest challenge to its authority since it seized power in a 2021 coup, with a surge in attacks by pro-democracy and ethnic minority insurgents on military bases in the north, northeast, northwest and southeast.翻译:缅甸军政府正面临自2021年政变夺权以来的最大挑战，亲民主派和少数民族叛乱分子对北部、东北部、西北和东南部军事基地的袭击激增。

China has repeatedly called for the end of fighting and urged Myanmar to cooperate with China in maintaining stability on their common border, and to prevent further casualties.翻译:中方多次呼吁停止战斗，敦促缅方与中方合作，维护共同边境稳定，防止进一步人员伤亡。

There have been several reports of Chinese citizens being killed in clashes, and China has sent advisories to citizens in Myanmar to avoid areas where violence was prevalent.翻译:有多起中国公民在冲突中丧生的报道，中国已向缅甸公民发出警告，避免前往暴力猖獗的地区。

"China is highly concerned about the conflict in northern Myanmar and urges all parties concerned in Myanmar to immediately cease fire and stop fighting, pay practical attention to China's security concerns, and work with China to maintain the safety of China-Myanmar co-operation projects and business personnel," foreign ministry spokesperson Wang Wenbin said while fielding questions at a regular press briefing.翻译:中方高度关注缅北冲突，敦促缅甸有关各方立即停火止战，切实关注中方安全关切，与中方共同维护中缅合作项目安全外交部发言人汪文斌在例行记者会上回答提问时表示。

Last week, assistant Chinese foreign minister Nong Rong翻译:上周，中国外交部部长助理农融

visited Myanmar urging the country to take effective measures to strengthen the security for Chinese institutions and personnel there.翻译:访问缅甸，敦促缅方采取有效措施，加强在缅中资机构和人员安全。

China imports fuel in gaseous form via a long-distance pipeline from Myanmar. Nong visited the Myanmar-China Gas Pipeline, part of China's Belt and Road infrastructure and energy network, linking Ramree Island on the western coast of Myanmar with Chinese border city Ruili in southwestern Yunnan Province.翻译:中国通过长输管道从缅甸进口气态燃料。农参观了中缅天然气管道，该管道是中国“一带一路”基础设施和能源网络的一部分，连接缅甸西海岸的拉姆里岛和中国云南省西南部边境城市瑞丽。

item.title: 中国购物节期间的价格战暴露了消费者的困境
item.description:
A ferocious price war among China's e-commerce retailers during the "Singles Day" shopping event is exposing further weakness in household consumption and raising concerns that the world's second-largest economy will resume its slowdown.翻译:中国电子商务零售商在“双十一”购物活动期间展开的激烈价格战暴露了家庭消费的进一步疲软，并引发了人们对世界第二大经济体将恢复放缓的担忧。

Originally a 24-hour online shopping event in China held on Nov. 11, Singles Day, a nod to the digits in the date, has expanded into weeks of promotions, including in brick-and-mortar stores, making it the world's largest shopping festival.翻译:“光棍节”原本是中国于 11 月 11 日举行的 24 小时在线购物活动，如今已扩展为为期数周的促销活动，包括在实体店进行，使其成为全球最大的购物活动节日。

This year's festival is being more closely watched than ever as a gauge of consumer confidence as China flirts with deflation and has identified boosting household demand as key to avoiding lost decades of sluggish growth.翻译:今年的节日比以往任何时候都受到更密切的关注，因为中国正面临通货紧缩，并认为提振家庭需求是避免数十年经济增长低迷的关键，因为它衡量了消费者的信心。

On Taobao and Tmall, platforms owned by e-commerce giant Alibaba (9988.HK), consumers can receive a 50 yuan ($6.86) discount when they spend 300 yuan. The company is pressuring merchants to offer rock-bottom prices during Singles Day after promising it will offer 80 million products at their lowest prices this year for the sale, which started in late October.翻译:在电子商务巨头阿里巴巴（9988.HK）旗下的淘宝和天猫平台上，消费者消费满300元即可享受50元（6.86美元）的折扣。该公司承诺今年将以最低价格出售 8000 万件产品，并在双十一期间向商家施压，要求他们提供最低价格。促销活动于 10 月底开始。

PDD Holdings' (PDD.O) Pinduoduo and JD.com have between them indicated they would offer billions in cashback deals over the sales period for people shopping on their respective platforms.翻译:拼多多控股(PDD.O)拼多多和京东已表示，他们将在销售期间为在各自平台上购物的人们提供数十亿美元的现金返还优惠。

"Low prices and discounts has been the overarching theme," said Jason Yu, greater China managing director of market research firm Kantar Worldpanel, noting that even the newly-released iPhone 15 was selling with a 500 yuan discount.翻译:市场研究公司凯度消费者指数 (Kantar Worldpanel) 大中华区董事总经理 Jason Yu 表示：“低价和折扣一直是最重要的主题。”他指出，即使是新发布的 iPhone 15 也以 500 元的折扣出售。

"It's a sign that nobody's going to easily spend 10,000 yuan ($1,371) on a handset right now. Confidence is a bit weak."翻译:“这表明现在没有人会轻易花 10,000 元人民币（1,371 美元）购买手机。信心有点薄弱。”

Data released on Thursday showing a drop in consumer prices to their lowest since the COVID-19 pandemic has increased the doubts in China's economic rebound after some months of indicators showing growth stabilising.翻译:周四公布的数据显示，消费者价格跌至自 COVID-19 大流行以来的最低水平，这增加了人们对中国经济反弹的疑虑，此前几个月的指标显示增长趋于稳定。

China's big online shopping platforms did not release final sales figures for 2022, when analysts said COVID-19 restrictions inhibited spending and consumer confidence. It is unclear whether they will release figures for this year, but expectations are subdued, and for good reason.翻译:中国的大型在线购物平台没有公布 2022 年的最终销售数据，当时分析师表示，COVID-19 限制抑制了支出和消费者信心。目前尚不清楚他们是否会公布今年的数据，但预期较低，这是有充分理由的。

Bain and Company found that 77% of the 3,000 consumers it surveyed plan to cut or maintain their level of spending on Singles Day compared with last year.翻译:贝恩公司发现，在其调查的 3,000 名消费者中，77% 计划与去年相比削减或维持双十一的支出水平。

"Macroeconomic headwinds are causing consumers to be more value-conscious," Bain said.翻译:贝恩表示：“宏观经济逆风导致消费者更加注重价值。”

Some indicators point to a slowdown in Singles Day sales. Data provider Syntun estimated e-commerce platforms sold 311 billion yuan of products from Oct. 31 to Nov. 3, a 7.1% decrease year-on-year. But it said that was partly mitigated by livestreaming platforms such as Douyin, Diantao and Kuaishou selling 10.5% more, at 99 billion yuan.翻译:一些指标表明双十一销售放缓。数据提供商Syntun估计，10月31日至11月3日，电商平台销售商品3110亿元，同比下降7.1%。但该公司表示，抖音、点淘和快手等直播平台的销售额增加了 10.5%，达到 990 亿元，在一定程度上缓解了这一影响。

Other analysts are more upbeat. Jacob Cooke, co-founder and CEO of e-commerce consultancy WPIC Marketing+Technologies, expects total sales growth of 14%-18%, saying he is "optimistic" that Chinese growth is "stabilising."

TRIPLE DIP

A downturn in China's giant property sector, where most of the household wealth is parked, indebted local governments cutting spending, youth unemployment rates surpassing 20%, and falling wages in some sectors of the economy have been keeping consumers in a thrifty mood.翻译:中国庞大的房地产行业（大部分家庭财富都存放在该行业）的低迷、负债累累的地方政府削减支出、 青年失业率超过20%，以及某些经济领域的工资下降，一直让消费者保持节俭的情绪。

A surprise rise in imports in October had raised hopes that spending might be turning a corner, but the fall in consumer prices suggests that higher commodity prices probably had more impact on trade than consumer demand.翻译:10 月份进口意外增长，引发了人们对支出可能出现好转的希望，但消费者价格下跌表明，大宗商品价格上涨对贸易的影响可能大于对消费者需求的影响。

Coupled with weak manufacturing surveys and waning external demand, the consumer price pressures point to China losing growth momentum into year-end.翻译:加上制造业调查疲弱和外部需求减弱，消费者价格压力表明中国在年底前将失去增长动力。

"We continue to see a serious risk of a triple dip for the economy," Nomura analysts wrote in a note.翻译:野村证券分析师在一份报告中写道：“我们仍然看到经济出现三次探底的严重风险。”

For Tan Jiapeng, a 35-year-old office worker in Beijing, his only Singles Day purchase so far has been a Descente winter jacket, an "essential purchase" for the winter. Worried about job stability, he abstained from buying Pokemon smartphone games, body lotion, and some Moutai liquor, all things he wished for.翻译:对于北京35岁的上班族谭家鹏来说，迄今为止他在双十一购买的唯一一件单品就是一件Descente冬季夹克，这是冬季的“必备品”。由于担心工作稳定性，他不再购买口袋妖怪手机游戏、润肤露和一些茅台酒，这些都是他想要的东西。

"It's known how difficult it is to find a job these days, even for the young people who are cheaper," Tan said. "The economy is moving downhill, I can't spend as freely as before."翻译:谭说：“众所周知，现在找工作有多么困难，即使对于工资较低的年轻人来说也是如此。” “经济正在走下坡路，我不能像以前那样自由花钱了。”

($1 = 7.2931 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2931 人民币）

Reporting by Casey Hall, Sophie Yu; Editing by Marius Zaharia and Christian Schmollinger翻译:凯西·霍尔 (Casey Hall) 报道，苏菲·余 (Sophie Yu)；马吕斯·扎哈里亚和克里斯蒂安·施莫林格编辑

item.title: 中国最大的银行中国工商银行遭受勒索软件攻击
item.description:
The Industrial and Commercial Bank of China's (ICBC) U.S. arm was hit by a ransomware attack that disrupted trades in the U.S. Treasury market on Thursday, the latest in a string of victims ransom-demanding hackers have claimed this year.翻译:周四，中国工商银行（ICBC）美国分行遭受勒索软件攻击，扰乱了美国国债市场的交易，这是今年黑客索要赎金的一系列受害者中的最新一起。

ICBC Financial Services, the U.S. unit of China's largest commercial lender by assets, said it was investigating the attack that disrupted some of its systems, and making progress toward recovering from it.翻译:中国资产规模最大的商业银行的美国子公司工银金融服务公司表示，正在调查这起破坏其部分系统的攻击事件，并在恢复方面取得进展。

China's foreign ministry said on Friday the lender is striving to minimise risk impact and losses after the attack.翻译:中国外交部周五表示，该行正在努力将袭击发生后的风险影响和损失降到最低。

"ICBC has been closely monitoring the matter and has done its best in emergency response and supervisory communication," ministry spokesperson Wang Wenbin told a regular news conference.翻译:工行新闻发言人汪文斌在例行新闻发布会上表示，工行一直密切关注此事，并尽最大努力做好应急处置和监管沟通。

Wang added businesses remained normal at ICBC head office and other branches and subsidiaries across the globe.翻译:王补充说，工商银行总行及全球其他分支机构的业务保持正常。

Hackers lock up a victim organisation's systems in such attacks and demand ransom for unlocking it, often also stealing sensitive data for extortion.翻译:黑客在此类攻击中锁定受害组织的系统，并索要赎金来解锁系统，通常还窃取敏感数据以进行勒索。

Several ransomware experts and analysts said an aggressive cybercrime gang named Lockbit was believed to be behind the hack, although the gang's dark web site where it typically posts names of its victims did not mention ICBC as a victim as of Thursday evening. Lockbit did not respond to a request for comment sent via a contact address posted on its site.翻译:几位勒索软件专家和分析师表示，据信一个名为 Lockbit 的激进网络犯罪团伙是此次黑客攻击的幕后黑手，尽管该团伙通常在其暗网网站上发布受害者姓名，但截至周四晚间并未提及 ICBC 是受害者。 Lockbit 没有回复通过其网站上发布的联系地址发送的置评请求。

"We don't often see a bank this large get hit with this disruptive of a ransomware attack," said Allan Liska, a ransomware expert at the cybersecurity firm Recorded Future.翻译:网络安全公司 Recorded Future 的勒索软件专家艾伦·利斯卡 (Allan Liska) 表示：“我们很少看到这么大的银行受到如此破坏性的勒索软件攻击。”

Liska, who also believes Lockbit was behind the hack, said ransomware gangs may not name and shame their victims when they are negotiating with them.翻译:利斯卡也认为 Lockbit 是此次黑客攻击的幕后黑手，他表示，勒索软件团伙在与受害者谈判时可能不会点名或羞辱受害者。

"This attack continues a trend of increasing brazenness by ransomware groups," he said. "With no fear of repercussions, ransomware groups feel no target is off limits."翻译:他说：“这次攻击延续了勒索软件组织日益肆无忌惮的趋势。” “由于不担心后果，勒索软件组织认为没有任何目标是不受限制的。”

U.S. authorities have struggled to curb a rash of cybercrime, chiefly ransomware attacks, which hit hundreds of companies in nearly every industry each year. Just last week U.S. officials said they were working on curtailing the funding routes of ransomware gangs by improving information-sharing on such criminals across a 40-country alliance.翻译:美国当局一直在努力遏制一系列网络犯罪，主要是勒索软件攻击，这些攻击每年都会袭击几乎每个行业的数百家公司。就在上周， 美国官员表示，他们正在通过 40 个国家联盟改善有关此类犯罪分子的信息共享，努力减少勒索软件团伙的资金来源。

The ICBC did not comment on whether Lockbit was behind the hack. It is common for targets to refrain from publicly disclosing the names of cybercrime gangs.翻译:ICBC 没有评论 Lockbit 是否是此次黑客攻击的幕后黑手。目标通常不会公开披露网络犯罪团伙的名称。

Since Lockbit was discovered in 2020, the group has hit 1,700 U.S. organizations, according to the U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA). Last month it threatened Boeing with a leak of sensitive data.翻译:据美国网络安全和基础设施安全局 (CISA) 称，自 2020 年 Lockbit 被发现以来，该组织已攻击 1,700 个美国组织。上个月，它威胁波音公司泄露敏感数据。

A CISA spokesperson referred questions about the ICBC hack to the U.S. Treasury Department.翻译:CISA 发言人将有关 ICBC 黑客攻击的问题转交给了美国财政部。

While market sources said the impact of the hack appeared limited, it signalled how vulnerable systems at large organizations such as the bank continue to be. Thursday's incident is likely to raise questions over market participants' cybersecurity controls and draw regulatory scrutiny.

TRADES CLEARED

ICBC said it had successfully cleared Treasury trades executed on Wednesday and repurchase agreements (repo) financing trades done on Thursday.翻译:中国工商银行表示，已成功清算周三执行的国债交易和周四执行的回购协议融资交易。

"In general, the event had a limited impact on the market," said Scott Skrym, executive vice president for fixed income and repo at broker-dealer Curvature Securities.翻译:经纪交易商 Curvature Securities 负责固定收益和回购的执行副总裁 Scott Skrym 表示：“总的来说，该事件对市场的影响有限。”

Some market participants said trades going through ICBC were not settled due to the attack and affected market liquidity. It was not clear whether this contributed to the weak outcome of a 30-year bond auction on Thursday.翻译:一些市场人士表示，由于袭击事件，通过工行进行的交易未能结算，影响了市场流动性。目前尚不清楚这是否导致了周四 30 年期债券拍卖的疲弱结果。

"There could have been maybe some technical issues with some participants not being able to access the market fully on the day," said Michael Gladchun, associate portfolio manager, core plus fixed income, at Loomis Sayles.翻译:Loomis Sayles 核心+固定收益副投资组合经理 Michael Gladchun 表示：“可能存在一些技术问题，部分参与者当天无法完全进入市场。”

The Financial Times reported earlier on Thursday that the U.S. Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association (SIFMA) told members that ICBC (601398.SS) had been hit by ransomware that disrupted the U.S. Treasury market by preventing it from settling trades on behalf of other market players.翻译:英国《金融时报》周四早些时候报道称，美国证券业和金融市场协会（SIFMA）告诉会员，中国工商银行（601398.SS）遭到勒索软件攻击，勒索软件阻止其代表其他市场结算交易，扰乱了美国国债市场玩家。

"We are aware of the cybersecurity issue and are in regular contact with key financial sector participants, in addition to federal regulators. We continue to monitor the situation," a Treasury spokesperson said in a response to a question about the FT report. SIFMA declined to comment.翻译:“我们意识到了网络安全问题，除了联邦监管机构之外，我们还与主要金融部门参与者保持定期联系。我们将继续关注事态发展，”财政部发言人在回答有关《金融时报》报告的问题时表示。 SIFMA拒绝发表评论。

The Treasury market appeared to be functioning normally on Thursday, according to LSEG data.翻译:根据伦敦证券交易所数据，周四国债市场似乎运行正常。

item.title: 澳大利亚与太平洋岛国图瓦卢签署安全和移民协议
item.description:
Australia announced on Friday a security guarantee to the Pacific Islands nation of Tuvalu to respond to military aggression, protect it from climate change and boost migration in a pact aimed at countering China's influence in the Pacific.翻译:澳大利亚周五宣布向太平洋岛国图瓦卢提供安全保证，以应对军事侵略、保护其免受气候变化影响并促进移民，以对抗中国在太平洋地区的影响力。

Under the treaty announced by Australia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese and his Tuvalu counterpart Kausea Natano, Australia will also vet Tuvalu's security arrangements with other nations.翻译:根据澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内塞和图瓦卢总理考西亚·纳塔诺宣布的条约，澳大利亚还将审查图瓦卢与其他国家的安全安排。

Albanese said it was Australia's most significant agreement with a Pacific Island nation, giving "a guarantee that upon a request from Tuvalu for any military assistance based upon security issues, Australia will be there."翻译:阿尔巴内塞表示，这是澳大利亚与太平洋岛国达成的最重要的协议，“保证当图瓦卢提出基于安全问题的任何军事援助请求时，澳大利亚将予以援助”。

Tuvalu is one of just 13 nations to maintain an official diplomatic relationship with Taiwan, as Beijing has made increasing inroads into the Pacific.翻译:随着北京不断深入太平洋地区，图瓦卢是仅有的 13 个与台湾保持正式外交关系的国家之一。

Under the treaty, "both countries commit to mutually agree any partnership, arrangement or engagement with any other state or entity on security and defence related matters in Tuvalu," Albanese said in a press conference on the sidelines of a Pacific leaders meeting in the Cook Islands.翻译:阿尔巴内塞在库克太平洋领导人会议间隙举行的新闻发布会上表示，根据该条约，“两国承诺就图瓦卢的安全和国防相关事务与任何其他国家或实体就任何伙伴关系、安排或接触达成一致”岛屿。

An Australian government official said this requirement covered any defence, police, port, telecommunications, energy or cyber security arrangements by Tuvalu.翻译:一名澳大利亚政府官员表示，这一要求涵盖图瓦卢的任何国防、警察、港口、电信、能源或网络安全安排。

Although Australia has defence agreements with other Pacific Islands nations, in a region where China recently struck a security pact with Solomon Islands and is seeking to expand its policing ties and infrastructure projects, the Tuvalu treaty goes much further in positioning Australia as its primary security partner.翻译:尽管澳大利亚与其他太平洋岛屿国家签订了防务协议，但在中国最近与所罗门群岛签署安全协议并寻求扩大警务关系和基础设施项目的地区，图瓦卢条约更进一步将澳大利亚定位为其主要安全伙伴。

Australia would allow 280 people a year to migrate from Tuvalu, boosting remittances back to the island nation with a population of 11,000, which is threatened by rising sea levels caused by climate change.翻译:澳大利亚将每年允许 280 人从图瓦卢移民，从而增加返回这个拥有 11,000 人口的岛国的汇款，该岛国正受到气候变化导致的海平面上升的威胁。

Natano said Tuvalu had requested the treaty to "safeguard and support each other as we face the existence of threat of climate change and geostrategic challenges".翻译:纳塔诺表示，图瓦卢要求该条约“在我们面临气候变化威胁和地缘战略挑战时相互保护和支持”。

The annual cap on visas would ensure migration to Australia "does not cause brain drain", he added.翻译:他补充说，每年的签证上限将确保移民澳大利亚“不会导致人才流失”。

"The Australia-Tuvalu Falepili union will be regarded as a significant day in which Australia acknowledged that we are part of the Pacific family," Albanese said.翻译:阿尔巴内塞说：“澳大利亚-图瓦卢法莱皮利联盟将被视为一个重要的日子，澳大利亚承认我们是太平洋大家庭的一部分。”

Funds will also be provided for land reclamation in Tuvalu to expand land in capital Funafuti by around 6%.翻译:还将为图瓦卢的土地开垦提供资金，将首都富纳富提的土地扩大约 6%。

Tuvalu, a collection of nine low-lying islands mid-way between Australia and Hawaii, is one of the world's most at-risk countries from climate change and has long drawn international attention to the issue.翻译:图瓦卢是澳大利亚和夏威夷之间九个低洼岛屿的集合体，是世界上受气候变化影响最严重的国家之一，长期以来一直引起国际社会对这一问题的关注。

Tuvalu told the COP27 climate summit last year Tuvalu plans to build a digital version of itself, replicating islands and landmarks and preserving its history and culture.翻译:图瓦卢去年在 COP27 气候峰会上表示，图瓦卢计划建立自己的数字版本，复制岛屿和地标，并保护其历史和文化。

A plan announced by Canberra and Washington last month to fund a new undersea cable in the Pacific would connect Tuvalu, which relies on satellite, to a cable for the first time.翻译:堪培拉和华盛顿上个月宣布了一项计划，资助在太平洋修建一条新的海底电缆，这将首次将依赖卫星的图瓦卢连接到电缆。

Australia sees deeper economic and social integration with the Pacific Islands as a way to ensure the security of the region, a government official said.翻译:一位政府官员表示，澳大利亚将与太平洋岛屿更深层次的经济和社会融合视为确保该地区安全的一种方式。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham, Alasdair Pal and Lewis Jackson in Sydney; Editing by Kim Coghill, Christopher Cushing, Lincoln Feast and Michael Perry翻译:Kirsty Needham、Alasdair Pal 和 Lewis Jackson 在悉尼的报道；编辑：Kim Coghill、Christopher Cushing、Lincoln Feast 和 Michael Perry

item.title: 印度和美国开始谈判以在“全球挑战”中加强伙伴关系
item.description:
Top cabinet officials of India and the United States held talks on Friday, stressing the need to further strengthen their friendship to be able to deal with urgent global, geopolitical challenges.翻译:印度和美国高级内阁官员周五举行会谈，强调需要进一步加强两国友谊，以便能够应对紧迫的全球地缘政治挑战。

The so-called annual "2+2 Dialogue" between U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken and Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin, and their Indian counterparts Foreign Minister Subrahmanyam Jaishankar and Defence Minister Rajnath Singh, aims to boost defence cooperation and align the policy objectives of the two countries in the Indo-Pacific region.翻译:美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯和国防部长劳埃德·奥斯汀与印度外长苏杰生和国防部长拉杰纳特·辛格之间的所谓年度“2+2对话”旨在加强防务合作，协调两国的政策目标。印度-太平洋地区的两个国家。

Although Washington is preoccupied with the wars in Gaza and Ukraine, Friday's talks are expected to focus more on taking forward the India-U.S. defence and strategic relationship and regional issues in South Asia and the larger Indian Ocean region, officials and analysts have said.翻译:官员和分析人士表示，尽管华盛顿正忙于加沙和乌克兰战争，但周五的会谈预计将更多地关注推进印美防务和战略关系以及南亚和更大印度洋地区的地区问题。

"Defence remains one of the most important pillars of our bilateral relationship," Singh said in opening remarks at the meeting. "In spite of various emerging geopolitical challenges, we need to keep our focus on important and long-term issues."翻译:辛格在会议开幕词中表示：“防务仍然是我们双边关系最重要的支柱之一。” “尽管存在各种新出现的地缘政治挑战，但我们需要继续关注重要和长期的问题。”

The two countries which were once on opposite sides of the Cold War are now working on landmark deals including for the U.S. to supply and manufacture engines for Indian fighter jets, the supply of MQ-9 predator drones and cooperation in semiconductor manufacturing.翻译:这两个曾经在冷战时期处于对立面的国家现在正在达成具有里程碑意义的协议，包括美国为印度战斗机供应和制造发动机、供应MQ-9“捕食者”无人机以及在半导体制造方面的合作。

Austin said it was more important than ever that the world's two largest democracies exchange views, find common goals, and deliver for our people, "in the face of urgent global challenges".翻译:奥斯汀表示，“面对紧迫的全球挑战”，世界上两个最大的民主国家交换意见、找到共同目标并为我们的人民提供服务比以往任何时候都更加重要。

"We're integrating our industrial bases, strengthening our inter-operability, and sharing cutting-edge technology," Austin said.翻译:“我们正在整合我们的工业基础，加强我们的互操作性，并共享尖端技术，”奥斯汀说。

The four officials are expected to pick up the threads from Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi's successful visit to Washington in June and President Joe Biden's trip to New Delhi for the G20 summit in September.翻译:预计这四位官员将了解印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪 6 月成功访问华盛顿以及总统乔·拜登 9 月前往新德里参加 G20 峰会的线索。

"Together we have been taking very concrete steps to deliver on the vision that our two leaders put forward," Blinken said.翻译:布林肯说：“我们一直在共同采取非常具体的步骤来实现我们两位领导人提出的愿景。”

"We are promoting a free and open, prosperous, secure and resilient Indo-Pacific, including by strengthening our partnership through the QUAD with Japan and Australia," he said, referring to the four-country grouping seen as an effort to counter China's rise.翻译:他说：“我们正在促进一个自由、开放、繁荣、安全和有弹性的印太地区，包括通过四国集团与日本和澳大利亚加强我们的伙伴关系。”他指的是被视为对抗中国崛起的四国集团。

Jaishankar said the dialogue would help build "a forward-looking partnership while we construct a shared global agenda".翻译:苏杰生表示，此次对话将有助于“在我们构建共同的全球议程的同时建立前瞻性的伙伴关系”。

The two countries are also expected to discuss their mutual concerns over China, days before Biden's expected meeting with China's President Xi Jinping next week on the sidelines of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit in San Francisco.翻译:预计两国还将在拜登下周在旧金山亚太经济合作组织峰会期间与中国国家主席习近平会面的几天前讨论对中国的共同担忧。

India-U.S. relations have steadily grown stronger on several fronts in the last two decades but New Delhi has also carefully preserved long-standing relations with Russia, much to the frustration of the West as the war in Ukraine drags.翻译:过去二十年里，印美关系在多个方面稳步发展，但新德里也小心翼翼地维持着与俄罗斯的长期关系，这让西方在乌克兰战争拖延之际感到沮丧。

Reporting by YP Rajesh; Editing by Raju Gopalakrishnan翻译:YP Rajesh 报道；编辑：拉朱·戈帕拉克里希南

item.title: 美国和中国在 COP28 会谈前就气候问题达成“谅解”——克里
item.description:
The United States and China have reached "understandings and agreements" on climate issues that will help ensure progress is made at the COP28 talks starting late this month in Dubai, U.S. climate envoy John Kerry said on Friday.翻译:美国气候特使约翰·克里周五表示，美国和中国已就气候问题达成“谅解和协议”，这将有助于确保本月末在迪拜举行的 COP28 会谈取得进展。

Kerry met with his Chinese counterpart Xie Zhenhua at Sunnylands, California, this week for four days of talks he described as tough and serious.翻译:克里本周在加利福尼亚州桑尼兰兹会见了中国外长解振华，进行了为期四天的会谈，他称会谈是艰难而严肃的。

"We had a few moments where, as in any negotiation, you think it's all despair," Kerry said at the Bloomberg New Economy Forum in Singapore. "We did come up with some very solid understandings and agreements which will help the COP and will also put us both in a place where we can help the world by focusing on more renewables and other kinds of things," he said.翻译:克里在新加坡举行的彭博新经济论坛上表示：“我们有过一些时刻，就像在任何谈判中一样，你会觉得一切都令人绝望。”他说：“我们确实达成了一些非常扎实的谅解和协议，这将有助于缔约方会议，也将使我们双方能够通过关注更多的可再生能源和其他事物来帮助世界。”

Common ground between the world's two top economies and biggest greenhouse gas emitters is considered a crucial part of any consensus at COP28, which is expected to focus on issues like climate finance and more ambitious energy transition goals.翻译:世界两大经济体和最大温室气体排放国之间的共同点被认为是 COP28 共识的重要组成部分，预计该会议将重点讨论气候融资和更雄心勃勃的能源转型目标等问题。

Kerry said details of the agreements between the two would be released soon.翻译:克里表示，两国协议的细节将很快公布。

One important agreement reached on climate loss and damage would allow any country to contribute to a fund to support the regions most vulnerable to climate impacts, Kerry said.翻译:克里表示，就气候损失和损害达成的一项重要协议将允许任何国家向基金捐款，以支持最容易受到气候影响的地区。

Much of the focus on China at COP28 will be on its ongoing programme to build more coal-fired power plants, and Beijing's reluctance to commit to a concrete target to cut fossil fuel use as it tries to guarantee energy security and economic growth.翻译:COP28 上对中国的关注主要集中在其正在进行的建设更多燃煤电厂的计划，以及北京方面在努力保证能源安全和经济增长的同时不愿承诺削减化石燃料使用的具体目标。

China envoy Xie told diplomats in September that phasing out fossil fuels was "unrealistic" while key technologies like energy storage remained immature.翻译:中国特使谢九月对外交官表示，逐步淘汰化石燃料是“不现实的” ，而储能等关键技术仍不成熟。

Kerry, when asked if he expected any compromise on coal from China, said: "You wait and see."翻译:当被问及是否预计中国会在煤炭问题上做出妥协时，克里表示：“你等着瞧吧。”

China now has 360 gigawatts of coal-fired power capacity in its project construction pipeline, he said, but "they're trying very hard to move away."翻译:他说，中国现在有360吉瓦的燃煤发电能力正在建设中，但“他们正在努力撤离”。

Right now, "it is irresponsible to be funding a coal-fired power plant anywhere in the world," he said.翻译:目前，“为世界任何地方的燃煤电厂提供资金都是不负责任的，”他说。

Reporting by David Stanway; Editing by Tom Hogue翻译:大卫·斯坦威报道；汤姆·霍格编辑
item.author: David Stanway

item.title: 欧盟和中国气候高级官员将于下周举行会谈
item.description:
The European Union and China's top climate change officials will meet in Beijing for talks next week, ahead of the United Nations' COP28 climate summit, an EU official told Reuters.翻译:一位欧盟官员告诉路透社，欧盟和中国气候变化高级官员将于下周在联合国 COP28 气候峰会之前在北京举行会谈。

Nearly 200 countries are set to gather from Nov. 30 to Dec. 12 in Dubai for this year's U.N. climate negotiations, their annual chance to strike global deals to tackle climate change.翻译:近200个国家将于11月30日至12月12日齐聚迪拜，参加今年的联合国气候谈判，这是他们达成应对气候变化全球协议的年度机会。

EU Climate Commissioner Wopke Hoekstra will travel to Beijing next week for talks with China's top climate envoy Xie Zhenhua, the EU official said.翻译:欧盟官员表示，欧盟气候委员沃普克·霍克斯特拉将于下周前往北京与中国气候变化特使解振华举行会谈。

It will be their first in-person meeting since Hoekstra, a former Dutch foreign minister, took over responsibility for climate change policies in the 27-country EU last month.翻译:这将是荷兰前外长霍克斯特拉上个月接手欧盟 27 国气候变化政策职责以来双方的首次面对面会议。

The meeting will be a chance for each side to air their positions and lay the groundwork for deals at COP28, where countries will consider a variety of issues, including whether to agree to phase out carbon-dioxide-emitting fossil fuels.翻译:这次会议将为双方提供一个表达立场并为 COP28 达成协议奠定基础的机会，各国将在会上考虑各种问题，包括是否同意逐步淘汰排放二氧化碳的化石燃料。

Deals at U.N. climate summits must be agreed unanimously between all countries. But final agreements are often hammered out among the world's economic powers. China is the world's second-biggest economy, after the United States. The EU is the third.翻译:联合国气候峰会上的协议必须得到所有国家的一致同意。但最终协议往往是由世界经济强国敲定的。中国是仅次于美国的世界第二大经济体。欧盟位居第三。

Xie met his U.S. counterpart John Kerry for talks this week in California.翻译:谢霆锋本周在加利福尼亚州会见了美国总统约翰·克里(John Kerry)。

The EU and U.S. are rallying support from governments for a deal at COP28 to triple renewable energy capacity by 2030, and hope to win backing from China. Beijing has signalled an openness to the goal, provided it takes into account the divergent economic conditions of different countries.翻译:欧盟和美国正在争取各国政府的支持，以在 COP28 上达成一项到 2030 年将可再生能源产能增加两倍的协议，并希望赢得中国的支持。北京已表示对这一目标持开放态度，但前提是考虑到不同国家不同的经济状况。

China has more renewable energy capacity than any other country. It is also the world's biggest user of coal, the most highly carbon-emitting fossil fuel.翻译:中国拥有比任何其他国家都多的可再生能源产能。它也是世界上最大的煤炭消费国，煤炭是碳排放量最高的化石燃料。

But Brussels and Beijing are at odds over other climate issues.翻译:但布鲁塞尔和北京在其他气候问题上存在分歧。

The EU is the biggest provider among wealthy nations of climate finance to poorer countries, and plans to push at COP28 for China and other major emerging economies to also contribute to U.N. climate funds.翻译:欧盟是富裕国家中向贫穷国家提供气候融资的最大提供者，并计划在第二十八次缔约方会议上推动中国和其他主要新兴经济体也向联合国气候基金捐款。

Beijing resists this. China refers to itself as a developing country, and says wealthy industrialised nations, who are responsible for most of the CO2 emissions causing climate change, must meet their obligations to provide this funding.翻译:北京对此予以抵制。中国称自己为发展中国家，并表示富裕的工业化国家必须履行提供这笔资金的义务，而这些国家对造成气候变化的大部分二氧化碳排放负有责任。

Tensions between Europe and China have also mounted after Brussels launched an investigation last month into whether to impose tariffs on imports of Chinese electric vehicle it says are unfairly advantaged by state subsidies.翻译:布鲁塞尔上个月发起一项调查，调查是否对进口中国电动汽车征收关税，称这些汽车因国家补贴而获得不公平的优势，欧洲和中国之间的紧张关系也随之加剧。

item.title: 独家：碧桂园计划年底前制定离岸债务重组计划
item.description:
China's embattled Country Garden (2007.HK) is aiming to pull together a tentative plan to restructure its offshore debt by the end of this year, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter said.翻译:两名直接了解情况的消息人士称，陷入困境的中国碧桂园(2007.HK)计划在今年年底前制定一项重组其离岸债务的暂定计划。

The nation's biggest private property developer, which missed a coupon payment in October triggering default terms, then aims to start formal negotiations with offshore bondholders by February or March next year.翻译:该国最大的私人房地产开发商在 10 月份未能支付息票，引发了违约条款，该开发商计划在明年 2 月或 3 月之前开始与离岸债券持有人进行正式谈判。

They added the firm expects to inform key bondholders of its cash flow projections by the year's end, as part of the basis for the tentative restructuring plan.翻译:他们补充说，该公司预计将在年底前向主要债券持有人通报其现金流预测，作为暂定重组计划基础的一部分。

The sources declined to be identified as the matter was confidential. Country Garden, which has almost $11 billion of offshore bonds, declined to comment.翻译:由于此事属于机密，消息人士拒绝透露姓名。拥有近 110 亿美元离岸债券的碧桂园拒绝置评。

The timeline for the company's debt restructuring plan has not been reported before.翻译:该公司债务重组计划的时间表此前尚未有报道。

Country Garden has been in the spotlight since August when its debt woes became public, rattling markets and forcing Beijing to roll out more support measures for the property sector.翻译:自8月份碧桂园债务问题公开以来一直备受关注，令市场不安，迫使北京推出更多房地产行业支持措施。

It has joined a long list of Chinese property developers that are either working on debt restructuring proposals or have presented them to creditors after having defaulted on offshore debt over the past two years.翻译:它加入了众多中国房地产开发商的行列，这些开发商要么正在制定债务重组方案，要么在过去两年发生海外债务违约后已向债权人提交了这些方案。

Reuters reported this week that Chinese authorities have asked domestic financial behemoth Ping An Insurance Group to take a controlling stake in Country Garden. That report was denied by Ping An.翻译:路透社本周报道称， 中国当局已要求国内金融巨头平安保险集团控股碧桂园。中国平安否认了这一报道。

A state-engineered rescue of Country Garden would be one of the most significant interventions to date by authorities to support the cash-squeezed and highly indebted property sector, which accounts for a quarter of China's economy.翻译:国家对碧桂园的救助将是迄今为止当局为支持现金紧张且负债累累的房地产行业而采取的最重大干预措施之一，该行业占中国经济的四分之一。

The two sources, who have no information on the bailout talks, said some Country Garden bondholders do not expect a higher recovery rate on their investments even if such a deal were to eventuate.

ADVISERS BEGIN DUE DILIGENCE

Offshore bondholders sought urgent talks with Country Garden after it did not pay the $15 million coupon on Oct.18 - the end of a 30-day grace period, sources with direct knowledge of the matter have said.翻译:据直接了解此事的消息人士称，碧桂园在 10 月 18 日（30 天宽限期结束）未支付 1500 万美元息票后，海外债券持有人寻求与碧桂园进行紧急谈判。

CreditSights said in a Nov. 2 research note that Country Garden had "formally defaulted" on its offshore bonds due to the missed payment.翻译:CreditSights 在 11 月 2 日的一份研究报告中表示，由于未能及时付款，碧桂园已对其离岸债券“正式违约”。

The company has been privately communicating with some bondholders about its efforts to formulate a debt repayment plan since then, the sources said.翻译:消息人士称，此后该公司一直在私下与一些债券持有人沟通，以制定债务偿还计划。

Country Garden said on Oct. 10 that it had appointed CICC, Houlihan Lokey, and law firm Sidley Austin as advisers to examine its capital structure and liquidity position and formulate a "holistic" solution to repay its offshore debt.翻译:碧桂园10月10日表示，已任命中金公司、Houlihan Lokey和盛德律师事务所为顾问，审查其资本结构和流动性状况，并制定偿还境外债务的“整体”解决方案。

CICC did not immediately respond to Reuters' queries. Houlihan and Sidley Austin declined to comment.翻译:中金公司没有立即回应路透社的询问。霍利汉和盛德拒绝置评。

The advisers have begun due diligence on Country Garden's financial condition, including looking at cash flow for onshore projects, said the two sources and a separate source familiar with the matter.翻译:两位消息人士和另一位知情人士表示，顾问已开始对碧桂园的财务状况进行尽职调查，包括研究陆上项目的现金流。

As yet, few Chinese property developers have reached agreements on debt repayment plans.翻译:迄今为止，很少有中国房地产开发商就债务偿还计划达成协议。

Sunac China Holdings Ltd (1918.HK) in October became the first to complete the debt revamp scheme for its $9 billion offshore debt after winning approval from creditors and courts.翻译:融创中国控股有限公司（1918.HK）于10月在获得债权人和法院批准后，成为首家完成90亿美元离岸债务债务重组计划的公司。

Bigger rival China Evergrande (3333.HK), however, saw its initial $23 billion offshore debt restructuring plan thrown off course in September after Chinese authorities launched an investigation into its billionaire founder Hui Ka Yan and a flagship unit.翻译:然而，更大的竞争对手中国恒大（3333.HK）在中国当局对其亿万富翁创始人许家印及其旗舰部门展开调查后，其最初的 230 亿美元海外债务重组计划于 9 月被搁置。

Reporting by Xie Yu; Additional reporting by Clare Jim; Editing by Sumeet Chatterjee and Edwina Gibbs翻译:谢宇报道；克莱尔·吉姆的补充报道；苏米特·查特吉和埃德温娜·吉布斯编辑

item.title: 太平洋岛屿领导人确认瑙鲁前总统为下一任高级官员
item.description:
The Pacific Islands Forum confirmed the selection of former Nauru President Baron Waqa as the 18-member bloc's next top official at a meeting on Friday in the Cook Islands.翻译:太平洋岛屿论坛周五在库克群岛举行的一次会议上确认，瑙鲁前总统巴伦·瓦卡 (Baron Waqa) 被选为该 18 名成员国的下一任高级官员。

Current Nauru President David Adeang had abruptly left the annual leaders meeting a day earlier after objections were raised by at least one Pacific Islands leader over Waqa's nomination. Adeang did not travel with the other leaders to the island of Aitutaki, where meetings resumed on Friday.翻译:在至少一位太平洋岛国领导人对瓦卡的提名提出反对后，瑙鲁现任总统戴维·阿迪昂在一天前突然退出了年度领导人会议。阿迪昂没有与其他领导人一起前往艾图塔基岛，周五在那里恢复了会议。

Waqa's selection was backed by Micronesian nations, including Nauru. Other leaders had wanted to discuss the process by which he was selected.翻译:瓦卡的选择得到了包括瑙鲁在内的密克罗尼西亚国家的支持。其他领导人想讨论他被选中的过程。

Nauru has diplomatic ties with Taiwan and not China, and Waqa has previously clashed with Chinese diplomats.翻译:瑙鲁与台湾而非中国有外交关系，瓦卡此前曾与中国外交官发生冲突。

Nauru's government has not responded to requests for comment.翻译:瑙鲁政府尚未回应置评请求。

At a livestreamed press conference on Friday, Fiji Prime Minister Sitiveni Rabuka told reporters "we are not judges" on whether Waqa is a controversial figure.翻译:在周五的直播新闻发布会上，斐济总理西蒂维尼·拉布卡对记者说，对于瓦卡是否是一个有争议的人物，“我们不是法官”。

"We received the nomination as part of bringing back Micronesia," he said, referring to an agreement among the sub-regions of Micronesia, Polynesia and Melanesia for a process to rotate key roles within the bloc.翻译:他说：“我们收到提名是恢复密克罗尼西亚的一部分。”他指的是密克罗尼西亚、波利尼西亚和美拉尼西亚次区域之间就在该集团内轮换关键角色的进程达成的协议。

"I inherited a fractured Pacific forum. We mended the fracture," he said.翻译:“我继承了一个破裂的太平洋论坛。我们修复了这个破裂，”他说。

Pacific Islands Forum Secretary General Henry Puna, who will step down when his term finishes next year, said at the press conference that the leaders meeting on Friday had "reaffirmed their position from February on the appointment of Baron Waqa as the next secretary general."翻译:太平洋岛屿论坛秘书长亨利·普纳将于明年任期结束后卸任，他在新闻发布会上表示，周五的领导人会议“重申了他们从二月份开始就任命巴伦·瓦卡为下一任秘书长的立场”。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham; Editing by Tom Hogue翻译:科斯蒂·李约瑟报道；汤姆·霍格编辑

item.title: Meta 与腾讯达成协议，在中国销售 VR 耳机 - 华尔街日报
item.description:
Meta Platforms (META.O) has struck a deal with Tencent Holdings (0700.HK) to sell a new, low-cost virtual-reality (VR) headset in China, as it tries to return to a market where Facebook and Instagram remain blocked, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.翻译:Meta Platforms (META.O)已与腾讯控股(0700.HK)达成协议，在中国销售一款新型低成本虚拟现实 (VR) 耳机，试图重返 Facebook 和 Instagram 占据的市场据《华尔街日报》周四报道，该项目被封锁。

The preliminary deal will make Tencent the exclusive seller of Meta's headsets in China, the Journal said, citing sources, adding that the Chinese video game maker will start selling the headset beginning late 2024.翻译:《华尔街日报》援引消息人士的话称，初步协议将使腾讯成为 Meta 耳机在中国的独家销售商，并补充说这家中国视频游戏制造商将于 2024 年底开始销售该耳机。

The report did not mention the potential price of the headset.翻译:该报道没有提及这款耳机的潜在价格。

Facebook, along with Twitter, were blocked by Beijing in mid-2009 following deadly riots in the western province of Xinjiang that authorities say were abetted by the social networking sites.翻译:2009 年年中，在西部省份新疆发生致命骚乱后，Facebook 和 Twitter 均被北京封锁，当局称这场骚乱是由这些社交网站煽动的。

The VR deal gives Meta a chance to return to the Chinese market and compete with TikTok-owner Bytedance, which makes the VR headset Pico.翻译:VR交易让Meta有机会重返中国市场，并与TikTok母公司字节跳动竞争，字节跳动生产VR耳机Pico。

Meta's Quest is currently the bestseller in the nascent VR space. The company unveiled the next generation mixed reality headset Quest 3 earlier this year.翻译:Meta's Quest 目前是新兴 VR 领域的畅销书。该公司于今年早些时候推出了下一代混合现实耳机 Quest 3。

For China, Meta plans to use lenses in the headset that are cheaper than those in the Quest 3, according to WSJ. This version will also be sold in other markets.翻译:据《华尔街日报》报道，在中国，Meta 计划在耳机中使用比 Quest 3 更便宜的镜头。该版本也将在其他市场销售。

The report added that Meta would take a bigger share of device sales, while Tencent would take more of the content and service revenue, with the cheaper headset also providing games and other apps published by the Chinese company.翻译:该报告补充说，Meta 将在设备销售中占据更大份额，而腾讯将获得更多内容和服务收入，更便宜的耳机还提供中国公司发布的游戏和其他应用程序。

Meta and Tencent did not immediately respond to Reuters' requests for comment.翻译:Meta 和腾讯没有立即回应路透社的置评请求。

Reporting by Shubham Kalia in Bengaluru; Editing by Rashmi Aich and Mrigank Dhaniwala and Sonia Cheema翻译:Shubham Kalia 班加罗尔报道；编辑：Rashmi Aich、Mrigank Dhaniwala 和 Sonia Cheema

item.title: 苹果供应商立讯精密将在越南北部追加投资 3.3 亿美元
item.description:
Apple (AAPL.O) supplier Luxshare Precision Industry Co (002475.SZ) has been awarded a license to invest an additional $330 million in its plant in Vietnam's northern province of Bac Giang, raising the total investment to $504 million, provincial authorities said.翻译:越南北部省份北江省当局表示，苹果公司(AAPL.O)供应商立讯精密工业有限公司(002475.SZ)已获得许可，可对其位于越南北部北江省的工厂追加投资 3.3 亿美元，使总投资达到 5.04 亿美元。

The new facility at Luxshare-ICT, Luxshare's arm in Vietnam, will be on a plot of 29.1 hectares (72 acres) and will produce cables for smart devices, communications equipment, touch pens, smart positioning tags and smartwatches, Bac Giang authorities said in a statement dated Wednesday.翻译:北江省当局表示，立讯精密在越南的子公司 Luxshare-ICT 的新工厂占地 29.1 公顷（72 英亩），将生产用于智能设备、通信设备、触摸笔、智能定位标签和智能手表的电缆。周三的一份声明。

The facility is expected to be completed in 12 to 24 months, it added.翻译:它补充说，该设施预计将在 12 至 24 个月内完工。

China-based Luxshare, one of Apple's main AirPods makers, started investing in Vietnam since 2019. Its additional investment in the country comes as other manufacturers seek to further diversify production away from China.翻译:苹果的主要 AirPods 制造商之一、总部位于中国的立讯精密自 2019 年起开始在越南投资。该公司在该国追加投资之际，其他制造商正寻求进一步实现生产多元化，远离中国。

Earlier this year, another Apple supplier, Foxconn, set up a new factory in central Vietnam and raised its investment in the country by $250 million to make electric vehicles and telecom parts.翻译:今年早些时候，另一家苹果供应商富士康在越南中部设立了一家新工厂，并增加了在该国的投资 2.5 亿美元，用于生产电动汽车和电信零部件。

Luxshare did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:立讯精密没有立即回应置评请求。

Reporting by Phuong Nguyen; Editing by Lincoln Feast.翻译:Phuong Nguyen 报道；林肯·盛宴编辑。

item.title: 早在救援谈判之前，碧桂园就在努力建造房屋、支付账单
item.description:
When China's largest developer Country Garden first skipped debt payments in August, its shares tumbled 14%, marking a reversal of fortunes: from industry poster child to another troubled property company struggling to pay its creditors.翻译:当中国最大的开发商碧桂园8月份首次跳过债务偿还时，其股价暴跌14%，标志着命运的逆转：从行业典范变成了另一家陷入困境、难以偿还债权人的房地产公司。

The same month, Chinese authorities quietly started talks with Ping An asking the insurance group to take a controlling stake in the developer, according to a Reuters report that was denied by Ping An.翻译:据路透社报道，同月，中国当局悄悄开始与平安进行谈判，要求该保险集团持有该开发商的控股权，但平安否认了这一报道。

Interviews with contractors, workers and home buyers, as well as a review of lawsuits involving Country Garden, show that for months before its problems became public, the company was struggling to deliver homes and pay contractors on time.翻译:对承包商、工人和购房者的采访以及对涉及碧桂园的诉讼的审查表明，在其问题公开之前的几个月里，该公司一直在努力按时交付房屋并向承包商付款。

Until the middle of this year, the company was seen by most investors and home buyers as a beacon of strength in a real estate sector grappling with ballooning debt, tighter regulations and slumping sales. It was one of the few developers able to issue state-guaranteed onshore bonds last year and get credit lines from banks in early 2023.翻译:直到今年年中，该公司还被大多数投资者和购房者视为房地产行业的力量灯塔，该行业正在努力应对债务膨胀、监管收紧和销售下滑​​的问题。它是去年能够发行国家担保的境内债券并在 2023 年初获得银行信贷额度的少数开发商之一。

China, the world's second-largest economy, has struggled to recover from COVID shutdowns and issues with its giant property sector. Country Garden's woes highlight the challenge Beijing faces as it seeks to engineer a rescue plan for the company and improve conditions for the wider industry.翻译:作为世界第二大经济体的中国一直在努力从新冠疫情导致的停工和庞大的房地产行业问题中恢复过来。碧桂园的困境突显了北京在寻求为该公司制定救援计划并改善更广泛行业的条件时所面临的挑战。

"Nobody believed that Country Garden would fail. One important reason is that it seemed to have the implicit guarantee from the state," the Economist Intelligence Unit's Xu Tianchen told Reuters.翻译:“没有人相信碧桂园会失败。一个重要原因是它似乎有国家的隐性担保，”经济学人智库的徐天辰告诉路透社。

Observers believed Country Garden, which has liabilities of around $190 billion and more than 3,000 projects under development, was "good enough and big enough to escape a default or a collapse," he added.翻译:他补充说，观察人士认为，碧桂园负债约 1,900 亿美元，有 3,000 多个正在开发的项目，“足够好、足够大，可以避免违约或倒闭”。

Examples of Country Garden's earlier financial strains, reported here for the first time, include: A valve supplier unpaid since 2022; a steel provider partially paid with apartments; homeowners and workers reporting projects stalled from as early as January; and a Country Garden subsidiary which told a court earlier this year it was "insolvent and overwhelmed."翻译:在此首次报道的碧桂园早期财务紧张的例子包括： 一家阀门供应商自 2022 年以来一直未付款；钢铁供应商部分支付公寓费用；房主和工人报告项目早在一月份就陷入停滞；碧桂园的一家子公司今年早些时候向法庭表示，该公司“资不抵债，不堪重负”。

Lawsuits involving Country Garden and its contractors, including disputes over delayed construction and missing payments, have jumped to a record 459 cases this year, according to data compiled by EIU’s Xu.翻译:根据 EIU 的 Xu 汇编的数据，今年涉及碧桂园及其承包商的诉讼，包括延迟施工和拖欠付款的纠纷，已跃升至创纪录的 459 起。

Country Garden declined to comment.翻译:碧桂园拒绝置评。

After its default, Country Garden has stressed that delivery of homes will remain its top priority, saying last week it had delivered around 460,000 units in the first 10 months of 2023.翻译:违约后，碧桂园强调交付房屋仍将是其首要任务，上周表示，该公司在 2023 年前 10 个月已交付约 46 万套住宅。

In July, only weeks before it skipped debt payments, Country Garden launched a campaign on its WeChat channel titled “Beautiful Delivery”, showcasing newly built apartments and happy homeowners. Some of the projects, it said, were even delivered ahead of schedule.

'FACING LOSSES'

While disputes and delays are par for the course for any large developer, and data in China is often incomplete, the court documents shed light on a contrast between the image Country Garden presented publicly and some of its challenges behind closed doors.翻译:尽管争议和延误对任何大型开发商来说都是司空见惯的事情，而且中国的数据往往不完整，但法庭文件揭示了碧桂园公开展示的形象与闭门造车面临的一些挑战之间的对比。

In a case over alleged delayed delivery of apartments in the central megacity Chongqing, the local Country Garden subsidiary told the court it owed 60 million yuan ($8.2 million) in project payments and "faced severe financial losses and was unable to cover its liabilities", according to a verdict handed down in June.翻译:在中央大城市重庆涉嫌延迟交付公寓的案件中，碧桂园当地子公司告诉法院，其欠下 6000 万元人民币（820 万美元）的工程款，并且“面临严重的财务损失，无法偿还债务”，根据六月份作出的判决。

It said it was, "insolvent and overwhelmed, and even if the court reduced the damages at its own discretion, it may still be hard for the defendant to fulfill its obligations in the future."翻译:其表示，“无力偿债且不堪重负，即使法院自行裁量减少损害赔偿，被告今后仍可能难以履行其义务。”

Other court cases feature similar examples from last year and early this year: They involve sums as small as 267,475 yuan in arrears for 50% of an elevator installation fee or 2.8 million yuan demanded by an electrical installation company.翻译:去年和今年年初的其他法院案件也有类似的例子：其中涉及拖欠电梯安装费50%的267,475元或电气安装公司索要的280万元。

Some large contractors decided to skip the court process altogether, according to a steel supplier based in south China. He told Reuters "the priority for us is to get our money back through negotiations instead of filing a lawsuit, which is very time-consuming and won’t necessarily yield a satisfactory result."翻译:据华南一家钢铁供应商称，一些大型承包商决定完全跳过法庭程序。他告诉路透社，“我们的首要任务是通过谈判拿回我们的钱，而不是提起诉讼，这非常耗时，而且不一定会产生令人满意的结果。”

Country Garden owed the supplier, who did not want to be identified due to the sensitivity of the situation, an equivalent of several million dollars for reinforced steel bars.翻译:碧桂园欠该供应商相当于数百万美元的钢筋，由于情况敏感，该供应商不愿透露姓名。

He was promised half of the owed amount in unfinished apartments. The other half was to be paid in cash, but the supplier has so far only received a quarter of the payment.翻译:他得到了半数未完工公寓欠款的承诺。另一半则以现金支付，但供应商迄今为止只收到了四分之一的货款。

"The situation deteriorated from the second half of 2022, and it’s become even worse from the start of this year, when the payment to us was delayed,” said the supplier.翻译:该供应商表示：“从2022年下半年开始，情况就开始恶化，从今年年初开始，情况变得更糟，我们的付款被推迟了。”

The impact of Country Garden’s cash crunch has reverberated even after the missed August payments.翻译:即使在八月份未能付款之后，碧桂园现金紧缩的影响仍然产生了影响。

A week after that, contractor Qiao Jingjing, said his construction site in Xinzheng, a city of 1.2 million in Henan Province, also stalled.翻译:一周后，承包商乔晶晶表示，他位于河南省新郑市（拥有 120 万人口的城市）的建筑工地也陷入停滞。

Qiao, 38, was left with 20,000 yuan in unpaid wages for two months of his work. He said his company, Jujiang Group, which was a subcontractor at the site installing aluminum sheets, is owed more than 770,000 yuan.翻译:38岁的乔被拖欠了两个月的工资2万元。他说，他的公司钜江集团是现场安装铝板的分包商，欠债超过77万元。

Country Garden did not respond to questions about the payment or delivery disputes.翻译:碧桂园没有回应有关付款或交货纠纷的问题。

Qiao said apartment buyers and construction workers kept coming to Country Garden offices seeking information.翻译:乔说，公寓买家和建筑工人不断来到碧桂园办公室寻求信息。

"But Country Garden's sales staff have never given us any reply to these questions: When will the construction resume? When can the property be handed over to the owners? When will the workers get their wages?”翻译:“但碧桂园的销售人员从来没有给我们任何答复：什么时候恢复施工？什么时候可以把房产交给业主？工人什么时候可以拿到工资？”

item.title: 中国驻美国大使：中美关系仍面临挑战
item.description:
China's ambassador to the United States said Sino-US relations have shown positive signs of stopping a decline and stabilising but still faced challenges, as the leaders of both countries prepare for an expected highly-anticipated meeting this month.翻译:中国驻美国大使表示，中美关系出现止跌企稳的积极迹象，但仍面临挑战，两国领导人正在为本月备受期待的会晤做准备。

The most important thing was to find the right way for China and the United States to get along, Xie Feng said in a video speech on Thursday at the Forum on U.S.-China Relations in Hong Kong.翻译:谢锋周四在香港美中关系论坛上发表视频讲话时表示，最重要的是找到中美正确的相处之道。

Xie said under the leadership of China's President Xi Jinping and U.S. President Joe Biden, and with the joint efforts of both sides, relations have recently shown positive signs.翻译:谢大使表示，在习近平主席和拜登总统领导下，在双方共同努力下，近年来中美关系出现积极迹象。

"Sino-U.S. relations are still facing severe challenges, and there is still a long way to go to stabilise and improve relations," Xie said.翻译:谢说：“中美关系仍面临严峻挑战，稳定和改善关系任重而道远。”

Xie also said both sides believe that it was beneficial and necessary for China and the United States to maintain dialogue, both hoped that Sino-U.S. relations will stabilise and improve as soon as possible, and agreed to make joint efforts toward that at an anticipated San Francisco summit.翻译:谢大使还表示，双方认为中美双方保持对话是有益的、必要的，都希望中美关系尽快稳定和改善，并同意在预期的峰会上共同努力。弗朗西斯科峰会。

Xi and Biden are expected to meet on the sidelines of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum in San Francisco, which starts Nov. 15.翻译:习近平和拜登预计将在 11 月 15 日开幕的旧金山亚太经济合作组织 (APEC) 论坛期间会面。

The two leaders, who have been at odds over a number of global issues including trade, national security and Taiwan, last saw each other almost a year ago on the sidelines the G20 summit in Bali.翻译:两位领导人在贸易、国家安全和台湾等一系列全球问题上存在分歧，最后一次见面是在大约一年前的巴厘岛 G20 峰会期间。

item.title: 中国的光棍节是什么？如何庆祝？
item.description:
Black Friday? No. Cyber Monday? Nope. Prime Day? Absolutely not. The world's biggest shopping event happens in China each year - and it's called Singles Day.翻译:黑色星期五？不，网络星期一？没有。黄金日？绝对不。世界上最大的购物活动每年都会在中国举行，这天被称为“光棍节”。

Originally a holiday to celebrate being single, as a counter to Valentine's Day, the event has grown into a weeks-long online shopping festival that peaks on Nov. 11.

WHEN DID THE IDEA OF SINGLES DAY ORIGINATE?

The idea for Singles Day had originated at China's Nanjing University back in 1993 and was originally called "Bachelor's Day." On the day, single people treat themselves with gifts and presents, while also organizing social gatherings and parties.

HOW MUCH DO CONSUMERS SPEND?

Last year, the total value of goods sold during the shopping bonanza - also known as "Double 11" - totaled 1.15 trillion yuan ($157.97 billion), according to data from consultancy firm Bain.翻译:根据咨询公司贝恩的数据，去年购物热潮（又称“双11”）期间销售的商品总价值达1.15万亿元人民币（1579.7亿美元）。

That is more than four times the $35.3 billion U.S. shoppers spent last year during Cyber Week, the period from Black Friday to Cyber Monday, per data from Adobe Analytics.翻译:根据 Adob​​e Analytics 的数据，这是去年美国购物者在网络周（即黑色星期五到网络星期一期间）花费的 353 亿美元的四倍多。

Cyber Monday immediately follows Black Friday, which falls on the day after the U.S. Thanksgiving Day holiday, the busiest shopping day of the year in the United States.翻译:网络星期一紧随黑色星期五之后，黑色星期五恰逢美国感恩节假期后的第二天，这是美国一年中最繁忙的购物日。

But growth has been slowing even as overall sales for Singles Day hit record highs, with last year's 3% rise marking the slowest increase ever. The event has in recent years lost some of its novelty with the rise of other shopping festivals in China, including the midyear "618" sales that are the country's second largest.翻译:但尽管双十一的整体销售额创下历史新高，增长速度却一直在放缓，去年的增长 3%，创下有史以来最慢的增幅。近年来，随着中国其他购物节的兴起，其中包括中国第二大购物节“618”，该活动失去了一些新鲜感。

Strict COVID-19 curbs in China impacted sales last year, but several industry experts are expecting a rebound, as the economy improves and livestream sales remain robust.翻译:中国对 COVID-19 的严格限制影响了去年的销售，但几位行业专家预计，随着经济好转和直播销售保持强劲，销量将会反弹。

"We're optimistic about growth this year because the recovery seems to be stabilizing and consumption is on a more clear upward trend," said Jacob Cooke, co-founder and CEO of Beijing-based WPIC Marketing + Technologies.翻译:总部位于北京的 WPIC Marketing + Technologies 联合创始人兼首席执行官雅各布·库克 (Jacob Cooke) 表示：“我们对今年的增长持乐观态度，因为复苏似乎正在趋于稳定，消费呈现出更加明显的上升趋势。”

His e-commerce consultancy firm expects sales for the Chinese shopping event to rise in the range between 14% and 18% from last year, which is higher than Adobe's projection for a 5.4% rise in Cyber Week sales.

WHAT MAJOR BRANDS AND PRODUCTS ARE SHOPPERS BUYING?

While Alibaba 9988.HK started "Double 11" in 2009 to win over online shoppers with discounts and promotions, China's major e-commerce platforms now all take part in it.翻译:阿里巴巴9988.HK于2009年启动“双11”，以打折促销的方式吸引网购消费者，如今中国各大电商平台都参与其中。

JD.com (9618.HK) joined in 2012 and PDD Holdings-owned (PDD.O) Pinduoduo has also become a significant player, offering low cost products in competition with Alibaba-owned Tmall and Taobao platforms.翻译:京东（9618.HK）于2012年加入，拼多多控股（PDD.O）拼多多也成为重要参与者，提供低成本产品，与阿里巴巴旗下的天猫和淘宝平台竞争。

Last year, Chinese shoppers spent more on essentials, supplements, vitamins and pet-care products. Those products are expected to stay in demand this year, along with more lifestyle-focused products such as athletic wear and sports equipment.翻译:去年， 中国消费者在必需品、补充剂、维生素和宠物护理产品上的支出增加。这些产品以及运动服装和运动器材等更多注重生活方式的产品预计今年将保持需求。

"There is enormous demand among Chinese consumers for products and services that improve their lifestyles and facilitate self-expression," Cooke said.

HOW DOES SINGLES DAY COMPARE TO BLACK FRIDAY?

In comparison, U.S. shoppers last year had bought more Pokemon toys, Hot Wheels, TVs, footwear and air fryers during the key Black Friday and Cyber Monday shopping periods, according to Adobe.翻译:据 Adob​​e 称，相比之下，去年美国消费者在黑色星期五和网络星期一的关键购物时段购买了更多的口袋妖怪玩具、风火轮、电视、鞋类和空气炸锅。

From 2014 until 2021, Singles Day had posted growth rates of about 34% annually on average, versus Cyber Week's 17% average gain, according to data from consultancy Bain and from Adobe Analytics.

WHAT OTHER COMPANIES HOPE TO BENEFIT?

Several American companies from apparel makers Nike (NKE.N) and Lululemon (LULU.O) to cosmetics firm Estee Lauder (EL.N) and consumer goods giant Procter & Gamble (PG.N) have a big presence on the Tmall marketplace and stand to benefit from the event.翻译:从服装制造商耐克(NKE.N)和 Lululemon (LULU.O)到化妆品公司雅诗兰黛(EL.N)和消费品巨头宝洁公司(PG.N) 等多家美国公司在天猫市场上占有重要地位，并能从此次活动中获益。

Last year, Apple (AAPL.O), Nike and L'Oreal (OREP.PA) were also among the biggest winners from the event, along with Chinese home appliance makers such as Haier and Midea and sportswear brand Anta.翻译:去年，苹果(AAPL.O) 、耐克和欧莱雅(OREP.PA)也是该活动的最大赢家，此外还有海尔、美的等中国家电制造商以及运动服装品牌安踏。

Nike said in December "Double 11" demand in Greater China grew by mid-teens, outpacing the broader sports industry, with demand from Gen Z consumers for the brand growing by 45% during the shopping period in China on Tmall.翻译:耐克表示，去年 12 月“双 11”期间，大中华区的需求增长了 15%，超过了整个体育行业的增速，Z 世代消费者在中国天猫购物期间对该品牌的需求增长了 45%。

JD.com had noted Apple sold more than 1 billion yuan worth of products in the first minute of the event's final sales period.翻译:京东指出，苹果在活动最后销售期的第一分钟就售出了价值超过10亿元人民币的产品。

However, for this year, several global companies ranging from L'Oreal to Estee Lauder have taken a cautious stance around the spending spree in China during the shopping event.翻译:然而，今年，从欧莱雅到雅诗兰黛等多家跨国公司都对购物活动期间在中国的消费热潮持谨慎态度。

"The presale period of Tmall and particularly on -- in general, the Singles Day, confirms a softer trend versus a year ago," said Estee Lauder CEO Fabrizio Freda last week, adding that the company was more optimistic about the next part of the Singles Day events in November.翻译:雅诗兰黛首席执行官法布里奇奥·弗雷达 (Fabrizio Freda) 上周表示：“天猫的预售期，尤其是双十一，证实了与一年前相比疲软的趋势。”他补充说，该公司对接下来的销售情况更加乐观。十一月的光棍节活动。

L'Oreal CEO Nicolas Hieronimus on a post earnings call with analysts in October said it was too soon to comment on "Double 11."翻译:欧莱雅首席执行官 Nicolas Hieronimus 在 10 月份与分析师举行的财报电话会议上表示，现在对“双 11”发表评论还为时过早。

"The shy consumers are less shy during the big events, and we have seen that whether it's during Valentine's Day, whether it is 6/18, the market has had its best peaks of growth during this moment," Hieronimus said, adding he had lots of hope for the shopping bonanza.翻译:Hieronimus 表示：“害羞的消费者在大型活动期间不再那么害羞，我们看到，无论是情人节期间，还是 6/18，市场都在这一刻迎来了最佳的增长高峰。”对购物狂潮抱有很大的希望。
